grid.title: MAC Report Category ActivityType Config
grid.sqlSelect:
SELECT MCOC.ID AS ObjectID, MCOC.CategoryID AS ObjectCategoryID, MCC.Name AS ObjectCategoryName, MRC.EndUserID AS EndUserID, MCOC.ActivityTypeID, LTRIM(RTRIM(C.Customer_Name)) + ' - ' + CCL.LIST_VALUE AS ActivityTypeName, MCOC.IsActive
FROM MAC_CategoryObject_Config MCOC (nolock) INNER JOIN MAC_Category_Config MCC (nolock) ON MCC.ID = MCOC.CategoryID INNER JOIN MAC_Table_Config MTC (nolock) ON MCC.TableID = MTC.ID INNER JOIN MAC_Report_Config MRC (nolock) ON MTC.ReportID = MRC.ID LEFT JOIN CUSTOM_COL_LISTS CCL (nolock) ON CCL.CUSTOM_COL_LIST_ID = MCOC.ActivityTypeID LEFT JOIN CUSTOM_CUST_COLUMNS CCC (nolock) ON CCL.CUSTOM_CUST_COL_ID = CCC.CUSTOM_CUST_COL_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.CUSTOMERS C (nolock) ON C.CUSTOMER_ID = CCC.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE MCOC.CategoryID = @CategoryID
grid.sqlUpdate: UPDATE MAC_CategoryObject_Config SET CategoryID = @ObjectCategoryID, ActivityTypeID = @ActivityTypeID, ModifiedOn = GETUTCDATE(), ModifiedBy = @__UserId__, IsActive = @IsActive WHERE ID = @ObjectID

column.label: Activity Type
column.dataSelect: SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT CCL.CUSTOM_COL_LIST_ID AS ActivityTypeID, LTRIM(RTRIM(C.Customer_Name)) + ' - ' + CCL.LIST_VALUE AS ActivityTypeName FROM CUSTOM_CUST_COLUMNS CCC (nolock) INNER JOIN CUSTOM_COL_LISTS CCL (nolock) ON CCL.CUSTOM_CUST_COL_ID = CCC.CUSTOM_CUST_COL_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CUSTOMERS C (nolock) ON C.CUSTOMER_ID = CCC.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE CCC.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND CCL.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND CCC.IS_DROPLIST = 'Y' AND CCC.COLUMN_DESC = 'Activity Type' AND (@EndUserID IS NULL OR CCC.CUSTOMER_ID = (SELECT end_user_parent_id FROM dbo.CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = @EndUserID)) ORDER BY ActivityTypeName, ActivityTypeID
